price: Ata thonë: “O Zoti ynë, shpejtona pjesën tonë (të dënimit) para Ditës së Llogarisë!”
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبۡلَ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā ʿajjil lanā qiṭṭanā qabla yawmi al-ḥisābi
